name: Ethan Look
objective: To continue to grow my programming skills and enrich my experience in a challenging and engaging environment. To collaborate on a product or service in a team-driven atmosphere.

technicalExperience.title: Tidepool, San Francisco, CA
technicalExperience.subtitle: Intern, June 2015 - Present
technicalExperience.description: A non-profit startup developing a secure data platform with integrated apps to reduce the burden of Type 1 Diabetes.
infoList: Development of a command-line toolkit for data processing, analysis, and conversion to xlsx format.
Development of a client-side data visualization intended for printing.
Development of an iOS framework for interfacing with data ingestion APIs.
Development of an iOS application to add context to aggregated data.
Testing of software under white- and black-box conditions.
Documentation of resources for developed technologies.

technicalExperience.title: VandyApps, Student Organization
technicalExperience.subtitle: President, May 2016 - Present; Vice President, January - May 2016
technicalExperience.description: A club for students interested in expanding their software-development skills and preparing themselves to be industry-ready engineers.
infoList: Coordination of weekly general body meetings including member tech talks, learning sessions, and visits from external guests.
Fundraising for club-sponsored events and resources, such as our tech library.
Preparation of club-sponsored hack nights and coding competitions.
Development of teaching materials for introductory iOS sessions.

technicalExperience.title: Teaching Assistant and Grader, Data Structures Class
technicalExperience.subtitle: January 2016 - Present
technicalExperience.description: The second course in Vanderbilt's computer science curriculum which introduces data structures and their applications, problem solving techniques, and well-designed software.
infoList: Grading of weekly programming assignments and projects.
Student support via weekly office hours.
Grading of three written midterms and the final exam.
